body.p: Additional information relating to variable lease payments that, depending on the circumstances, may be needed to satisfy the disclosure objective in paragraph 51 could include information that helps users of financial statements to assess, for example:

li.p: the lessee’s reasons for using variable lease payments and the prevalence of those payments;
the relative magnitude of variable lease payments to fixed payments;
key variables upon which variable lease payments depend and how payments are expected to vary in response to changes in those key variables; and
other operational and financial effects of variable lease payments.
